name: Dungeon Warrior (BooLeet)
description:
A First Person Endless Slasher. 

Inspired by Shadow Warrior 2's melee combat. The game has 5 types of attack:

- Regular - Primary Attack Key;

- Sting - Move Forward + Secondary Attack Key;

- Spin - Strafe Left or Right + Secondary Attack Key;

- Sting - Move Backwards + Secondary Attack Key.

You can dash [Default Left Shift] and Force Push an enemy into the spikes [Deafult V].

All keys are rebindable.
